clauses.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
Session Behavioural advertising cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

case.text: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: Some cookies may involve the processing of personal data, i.e. when the user is identified by a name or email address that identifies the user (for example, as a registered user), through the IP address, or when unique identifiers are used to distinguish and track individual users (for example, advertising IDs).

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text:
Will BBVA send you commercial communications?

Through the data collection forms BBVA may obtain your consent to contact you by post, e-mail, SMS, or any other equivalent electronic means of communication, to send you commercial communications about their own products and/or third parties identified in the form.

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels
clauses.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.
clauses.clause_text: Facebook and Spotify cookies, for instance, are used on the website.

case.text: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
clauses.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.
clauses.clause_text: BBVA advertising partners use browser fingerprinting to target ads.

case.text: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: In order to provide you with a suitable service and manage the relationship we maintain with you as a user, we might communicate your data to telecommunications companies that process your information on behalf of BBVA, as part of service provision agreements with them.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: This service throttles your use
clauses.description: The service may impose limits or restrictions to the use of the service, thus negatively impacting users experience. They may do so without reason or prior notice.
clauses.clause_text:

case.text: Your use is throttled

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text: Furthermore, we would like to inform you that, for the same purpose as indicated in the previous paragraph, certain companies that provide services to BBVA may have access to your personal data (international data transfers).

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: Personal information that is shared outside its jurisdiction is processed according to the original jurisdiction’s data protection standards
clauses.description: The service has arrangements in place to ensure that users' personal information, if shared with an entity outside of the service's jurisdiction, is processed to the same standards that apply to the processing of personal data in the service's jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text: These transfers are made to countries with a level of protection comparable to that of the European Union (suitability decisions made by the European Commission, standard contractual clauses and certification mechanisms).

case.text: Personal information that is shared outside its jurisdiction is processed according to the original jurisdiction’s data protection standards

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
You will be able to consult your personal data included in BBVA files derechosprotecciondatos@bbva.com
Remember to attach a copy of your ID card or equivalent document accrediting your identity to your application Correction You can modify your personal data when they are inaccurate Suppression You may request your personal data be deleted

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis
clauses.clause_text: We will not pass on your personal data to third parties unless we are required to do so by law or you provide your consent.

case.text: Third parties are not allowed to access your personal information without a legal basis

clauses.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
clauses.description: Usually it's related to the right to object to data processing or restrict it under the GDPR. Users may be able to refuse the use of their data for marketing purposes for instance.
clauses.clause_text:
You may request that your personal data not be processed Limitation of processing1 You can request a limitation on the processing of your data in the following cases:

  • While the dispute over the accuracy of your data is being checked.
  • When the processing is illegal, but you object to your data being erased.
  • When BBVA does not need to process your data but you need it to exercise or defend claims.
  • When you have objected to your data being processed to undertake a task in the public interest or to satisfy a legitimate interest, while checking whether legitimate reasons for processing prevail over your own.

case.text: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

case.text: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided

clauses.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: You will be able to receive, in electronic format, the personal data you have provided to us, as well as to transmit them to another entity. If you believe that we have not processed your personal data in accordance with the regulations, you can contact the Data Protection Officer at the following address: dpogrupobbva@bbva.comNevertheless, you are entitled to submit a complaint to the Spanish Data Protection Agency (www.agpd.es) To exercise your rights, attach a copy of your ID card or equivalent document accrediting your identity to your application. These rights can be exercised at no cost.

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text: What do we use your personal data for?

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: If at any particular time you do not wish to continue receiving these kind of communications, you may revoke your consent by sending notification to the following address [derechosprotecciondatos@bbva.com], providing a copy of a document that allows proof of identity, or using the link provided for this purpose in the commercial communications you receive.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last update: August 2020.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

clauses.title: This service can delete your content if you violate the terms
clauses.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent) may be removed, with or without notice.
clauses.clause_text: In any case, BBVA reserves the right to suspend or remove any content that, while not illegal, maybe contrary to the rules set out in these Terms of Use, balancing in each case the legal interests in conflict.

case.text: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text: In this respect, BBVA reserves the right to decide on the continuation of the information and services provided through the Website.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: The User shall make lawful use of the website in accordance with current law, good faith and public order.

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: <li>The information offered on the Website is for informational purposes and shall not be deemed in any case as recommendation, technical, financial, legal, tax, or investment advice, or an offer or a guarantee by BBVA, nor should it be understood as a recommendation to trade, or constitute the basis for any decision-making, BBVA declines any responsibility for the use of the information contained on the website that may be made in this regard, and specifically must be understood that such information, subject to the laws and regulations in force in Spain, is not intended for those users who act under other jurisdictions of other states that require compliance with different requirements for the provision, disclosure or advertising of such information.

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text: We use our own and third-party cookies for a variety of purposes

clauses.clause_text: <li>BBVA is not responsible for the information contained therein that does not meet the expectations of the user.

case.text: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in Spain
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
clauses.clause_text: In accordance with Article 3 of the LSSI, the applicable laws to the services of the information that BBVA provides through the Website will be those of Spain.
